name: collapse-automation
description: Smart code folding for VS Code - automatically collapse function calls and code blocks based on patterns

scripts.lint: bun run typecheck && biome check lib
scripts.lint:fix: bun run typecheck && biome check lib --write
scripts.package: bun run lint:fix && bun run test && bun run build && vsce package --no-dependencies
scripts.publish: bun run package && vsce publish --no-dependencies && git push && git push --tags

commands.title: Collapse Automation: Collapse all non-important code blocks
Collapse Automation: Collapse all blocks (Outline View)

collapse-automation.alwaysFold.description: An array of strings or simple regex patterns. Any line containing a match will always be folded.

collapse-automation.neverFold.description: An array of strings or simple regex patterns. In '@collapse' mode, any line containing a match will be forcibly unfolded.

collapse-automation.collapseLevel.description: The folding level to apply when '@collapse' pragma is active. A value of 0 or -1 will collapse all levels deeply.

collapse-automation.enableCollapsePragma.description: Enable/disable the '@collapse' pragma functionality. When disabled, only 'alwaysFold' patterns will be processed.
